attributes.action: Allow biological parents the right to see their children if fostered or adopted by others.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After a lengthy and confusing court case some years ago, my husband and I lost custody of our children but were advised to keep in contact which we did. We were also told that after a 'settling in' period, we would be allowed to see them.  That was 16 years ago and we are still waiting to be asked to go and see them. We dont even know if any of our letters and photos have actually reached the children who are now young adults.
